ISSUE.TITLE: There is a problem with S3 MultipartUpload, only generated_ COPYING_ file
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** There is a problem with S3 MultipartUpload, only generated_ COPYING_ file For example, I use the S3 interface to MultipartUpload a 200M file in blocks, it will only generate_ COPYING_ File, no real target file will be generatedï¼Œand then it faild **System Setup** seaweed version is 3.39 **Expected behavior** Can MultipartUpload files normally

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: make directory lister trigger if mime type is httpd/unix-directory (#4169)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix null content type caused exception in hdfs client fix https://github.com/seaweedfs/seaweedfs/issues/4170
